Starstorm:

"hummm, perhaps we should speak with him before..."said Blackstorm 
witha malicious smile, she opened her comlink and said to Rave"We 
know that you're there, maximal, and we know that you're alone!!!! 
If you don't wish to suffer a painfull death, Left the base and 
surrender. If you decide not do it, we will destroy you!!!!"
